thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au | 2 of 37
thread.title: Thea

author: Thea
title: Thea
text:
I applied for a car loan for my first real car at Motorama, Moorooka. I chatted to Alisha, who helped me make all the right decisions and preached the features and benefits of my 2016 Mitsubishi Mirage.
Alisha was kind enough to push for a next day pickup, something that I knew was very unlikely. To my surprise, Alisha and the team at Moorooka pulled it together and I was able to pick up my new car within 24 hours of applying for a loan.
I highly recommend Motorama for future services to anyone in need, and I am genuinely grateful that I had such excellent service.
